item.title: After The MCU’s Avengers: Doomsday Cast Announcement, I’m Actually Really Excited To See What The New Avengers Team Lineup Is Like On-Screen
item.description: The surprise Avengers: Doomsday cast announcement has supercharged my excitement for the upcoming team of new Avengers members in the MCU.

item.title: 10 Classic Godzilla Storylines We'd Love To See In The MonsterVerse
item.description: A number of classic storylines from Godzilla's 70-year past on the silver screen would make for excellent additions to the lore of the MonsterVerse.

item.title: Pixar Art Brings WALL-E To Life With All His Motor Parts Made Of Only Chocolate
item.description: Awesome Pixar art brings the eponymous and well-known character in WALL-E to life with all of his motor parts made entirely of chocolate.

item.title: Alexander Ovechkin Passes Wayne Gretzky for Most Goals Scored in NHL History
